This short R script will install all necessary packages for SAMSA R programs to function.  The following packages are needed:
  DESeq2
  ggplot2
  gridExtra
  scales
  reshape
  knitr
  plyr

```{r}
install.packages("DESeq2")
install.packages("ggplot2")
install.packages("gridExtra")
install.packages("scales")
install.packages("reshape")
install.packages("knitr")
install.packages("plyr")
```
